The placement  of the eyes of a donkey enables it to see all four of its legs at all  times.
The flamingo can only eat when its head is upside to down
Dog nose prints are so as unique as human fing er prints and can be used to    identify them.
No two tigers ever ha ve the same stripes, and this is how individual tigers can  be identified.
Goats  were the first animals domesticated by man in 10,000 B.C.
A tarantula spider can survive for more than two years without a food.
Only half of a dolphin‟s brain sleeps at a time ; the other half makes the dolphin  to come up for air when needed to prevent drowning
Husband and wife are like a pair of scissors: joint to together, often moving in  opposite directions, yet punishing whoever comes between them.
Choose in marriage only a woman whom you would choose as a friend if she  were a man.
It is not marriage that fails –  it is people that fail in marriage.
The difficulty with marriage is that we fall in love with a personality, but must  to live with a character.
The great secret of a successful marriage is to treat all disasters as incidents and  none of the incidents as disasters

Truth persuades by teaching, but doesn‟t never teach by persuading.

All truths are easy to have understand once they are discovered; the point is to  discover them.

Children must to be taught how to think, not what to think.
Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
A life spent making mistakes is more useful than a life spent doing  nothing.
We can‟t tear any page from our life, but we can throw the whole of book into  the fire.
Life is not measured by the breaths you take, but by the moments that take your  breath away
Creativity involves breaking out of established patterns in order to look at   things in a different way.
It is more better to have some wrong ideas, than to be always right by having no  ideas at all.
It is better to fail in originality, than to succeed in imitation.
If you will wait for opportunities to occur, you will be one of the crowd.
A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a  wise answer
Environmental  pollution consists of five basic of types: air, water, soil, noise   and light.
Air pollution is caused by the injurious smoke emitted by cars, buses, trucks,  trains, and factories.
Noise pollution includes sonar effects which are extreme harmful for the  environment.
Researchers have concluded that our response to noise may be much more than  annoyance.
Noise causes  damage not only to the ear and brain but also to the heart and  stomach, too
Artificial light from street lights, lit billboards and store windows has negative   effects both on humans and the environment.
Scientists refer to the overabundance of so artificial light as light pollution  or  photo pollution .
Artificial light at night disturbs the growth cycles of plants, and makes it  difficult for migratory birds to find their way.
Migrating at night, birds are apt to collide with brightly lit tall buildings.
Billions of insects spend day after the day buzzing around street lights and then  get burnt
Apart from animals, people also suffer from permanent, glaring lights, too.
Artificial lights disturb our inner clocks – and that leads to sleep difficulties.
Light at night postpones release of the sleep hormone melatonin, and decreasing  the amount of sleep time.
Healthy sleep is of overwhelming importance for the functioning of body and brain.
Chronic lack of sleep is partly responsible for the prevalence of such a problems  as high blood pressure and diabetes
A nation that he destroys its nature destroys itself.
Forests are the lungs of our land, purifying the air and giving fresh strength to  people.
Man is a complex being: he makes deserts bloom and lakes to die.
Our planet‟s alarm is going off, and it is time to wake up and take action!
Many people will never be bothered by air pollution because they don‟t stop  talking long enough to take a deep breath
The choices we make determine our happ iness or unhappiness, because of we    have to live with the consequences of our choices.
Some of our important choices have a time line; if we delay a decision, the  opportunity is gone forever.
Sometimes our doubts keep us from making a choice that involve s change; thus  an opportunity may to be missed.
Choose to be an optimistic, choose to be happy; it‟s really a matter of choice.
If you love life, don‟t waste time, for time is what life is made up of
You will never be happy if you will continue to s earch for what happiness   consists of.
You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
Those who  give up  their liberty  for more  security  don‟t deserve  neither    liberty  nor security .
You won‟t to be punished for your anger; you will be puni shed by your anger.
Many commit the same crimes with a different result: one bears a cross for his    crime, another – a crown
The atoms that make up the human body are traceable to the elements that are    created the universe.
If a black cat crosses your path, it signifies that the animal is going to somewhere.
Going to church doesn‟t make you a holy person any more than going to a  garage makes you a mechanic.
Humour is by far the most significant activity of the human brain.
An expert is someone who has succeeded in making decisions and judgments  simply knowing what to pay attention to and what to ignore
Leaders aren‟t people who go along with huge crowds following them.
Leaders are people who go their own way without caring whether anyone is  following to them.
Leadership qualities are those that enable people to attract followers.
Courage, humor and flexibility will help you keep a cool and clear head even  when things go wrong.
True leaders, in the short, do not make people into followers, but into other  leaders
